title: ELF64 Reflective Loading [closed]
content:
I'm looking for an ELF64 reflective loader, so I can download an ELF and execute it without saving to disk?

Is anyone able to point me at one please?  Or a clear one for ELF32 so I can translate?

thanks

answers_data.content:
Code for diskless loading of ELF Shared Library using Reflective DLL Injection
https://github.com/nsxz/ReflectiveELFLoader

comments.text: Hi thanks. I've seen your code already, I'm looking to load a static binary into a process which is already mapped to 0x40000, will it remap the code for whether it gets malloced?
You should mention that you already see the code in your question, and it's not my code.
